metadata.title: CVE-2024-8647 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting 15.2 to17.4.6, 17.5 prior to 17.5.4, and 17.6 prior to 17.6.2. On self hostedinstalls, it was possible to leak the anti-CSRF-token to an external sitewhile the Harbor integration was enabled.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
